text: And to (the tribe of ) Thamud (We had sent) their brother Salih. He said (to them), "O my people! serve God, you have no god other than Him, clear proof has indeed come to you from your Lord, this is the she-camel of God, a sign for you, so leave her to pasture in God's earth and do not touch her to harm (her), otherwise a painful punishment will seize you
